Reviews.Title: “Spoiled weekend in Rome”
Reviews.Author: Sergey C
Reviews.Content: hotel smell dust ive found ants eating bug center bathroom bedclothes cleared bearable sleep disgusting furniture sad stuff kitchen stuff breakfast poor choose im fresh hotels manager stuff badly speaking english pain confirm reservation hope fate stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Never ever stay at this hotel!!!”
Reviews.Author: Styve007
Reviews.Content: recently stayed hotel hotel 6 nights night arrived late bedroom straight bedroom didnt match picture website hot wasnt heating system ac morning woke 7am shower door time toilet flashed jumping bed terrible noise sheets werent changed stay breakfast terrible move told wasnt eventually left hotel nights earlier wouldnt recommend hotel hotel location enjoy italy

Reviews.Title: “Don't stay here at Sigvilia Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: BeckyDK
Reviews.Content: booked hotel hotels arrived booked 6 month ahead moved hotel close termini station angry removed hotel farther hotel below standard breakfast poor boring worth eating disapointed stay thereif choose stay buy breakfast else clean sheets hot water shower finally conclusion stay hotel hotel defently rome becky denmark

Reviews.Title: “Below average”

Reviews.Content: couple budget hotel live expectations fairly clean dimly lit dingy hotel tired revamping reviews 34 hotel staff indeed extremely rude 1 helpful breakfast basement fitted hotels theme trying suck sort atmosphere hotel virgin mary painting hung bed italian found unsettling positive walk center rome quick walk especially day sight seeing overall hotel magical city rome fair price consider staying else risk loosing lot holiday

Reviews.Title: “The worst in Rome- If you can´t stay ANYWHERE else, don't visite rome!”

Reviews.Content: rome 3 nights stayed hotel reservation hotel fiamma informed hotel planning staying please reconsider worst acommodation dirty matress bed hair stains sound isolation hear walls effort bathroom flusher constant water noise kept sleeping couldnt worse breakfast bunker windows lady waitress addams family spooky incredibly rude dont ruin vacations ruined mine terrible advice reconsider
